ODMr
  • Get Started
  • Reference

ODMr: A package for working with the CUAHSI ODM

The aim of this package is to provide some functions for retrieving and loading data into an instance of a MS-SQL CUAHSI ODM database. In order to make use of these functions a valid ODBC connection for the target database needs to be defined.

ODMr functions

ODMselect can be used to retrieve data from an ODM database. ODMSelect returns a dataframe containing the required columns for working with ODM data.

ODMload can be used to get data into an ODM database. ODMload takes an dataframe containing the required columns for working with ODM data and loads it. The dataframe will usually have been acquired using ODMselect or created using ODMcreate.

  • ODMr functions
